sourcesContent:
// Standardized button styles for consistent UI
export const buttonStyles = {
  primary: {
    backgroundColor: '#3b82f6',
    color: 'white',
    border: 'none',
    borderRadius: '6px',
    padding: '0.75rem 1.5rem',
    fontSize: '1rem',
    fontWeight: '600',
    cursor: 'pointer',
    minHeight: '48px'
  },
  
  secondary: {
    backgroundColor: '#6b7280',
    color: 'white',
    border: 'none',
    borderRadius: '6px',
    padding: '0.75rem 1.5rem',
    fontSize: '1rem',
    fontWeight: '600',
    cursor: 'pointer',
    minHeight: '48px'
  },
  
  success: {
    backgroundColor: '#10b981',
    color: 'white',
    border: 'none',
    borderRadius: '6px',
    padding: '0.75rem 1.5rem',
    fontSize: '1rem',
    fontWeight: '600',
    cursor: 'pointer',
    minHeight: '48px'
  },
  
  danger: {
    backgroundColor: '#ef4444',
    color: 'white',
    border: 'none',
    borderRadius: '6px',
    padding: '0.75rem 1.5rem',
    fontSize: '1rem',
    fontWeight: '600',
    cursor: 'pointer',
    minHeight: '48px'
  },
  
  small: {
    padding: '0.5rem 1rem',
    fontSize: '0.875rem',
    minHeight: '40px'
  }
};
